subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees, intent on holding on to their first-round draft pick a week ago, decided instead to give up the selection in order to sign the free-agent reliever Rafael Soriano.
snippet: The Yankees, intent on holding on to their first-round draft pick a week ago, decided instead to give up the selection in order to sign the free-agent reliever Rafael Soriano.
